attributes.action: Force FIFA to ban Russia from hosting the 2018 World Cup
attributes.additional_details:
Russian fans jumping the barriers inside the Stade Vélodrome on 11/06/2016
Also attacking English fans in the streets of Marseiile
English fans have gone to hospital due to these attacks
attributes.background: Due to the disgusting and abhorrent behaviour by Russian fans during the England vs Russia match in Marseillle, I feel that Russia is incapable of hosting a safe tournament in two years time.

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because the UK Government or Parliament is not responsible for decisions about the hosting of the World Cup. That is the responsibility of FIFA.
